about_the_game:
The Voxelizer DLC enables you to import and effortlessly convert standard OBJ meshes into voxelized models.

  • Import OBJ with MTL and full texture support
  • Rotate and scale loaded meshes in real time after import
  • Imported meshes can be copied, pasted and duplicated like all other objects
  • Voxelized meshes can be converted to regular matrices for manual editing
detailed_description:
The Voxelizer DLC enables you to import and effortlessly convert standard OBJ meshes into voxelized models.

  • Import OBJ with MTL and full texture support
  • Rotate and scale loaded meshes in real time after import
  • Imported meshes can be copied, pasted and duplicated like all other objects
  • Voxelized meshes can be converted to regular matrices for manual editing

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel based
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Qubicle Voxelizer Module

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: The Voxelizer DLC enables you to import and effortlessly convert standard OBJ meshes into voxelized models.
